actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Urging the Senate to give its advice and consent to ratification of Convention No. 87 Concerning Freedom of Association and Protection of the Right to Organize as adopted by the International Labor Conference.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate
Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

summary.text: Urges the Senate to give its advice and consent to ratification of Convention No. 87 Concerning Freedom of Association and Protection of the Right to Organize as adopted by the International Labor Conference.
